Control Name: 4.6.7 Application traffic can be routed to data stores in the case of region/zone/network outages.
Control Statement: How is application traffic routed to data sources in the case of region/zone/network outage? i.e. Cosmos DB Automatic Failover.

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 4.6 What decisions have been taken to ensure the data platform meets your reliability requirements?
control_attributes.Control: 4.6.7 Application traffic can be routed to data stores in the case of region/zone/network outages.
